programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: A couple's home used to be the entertainment hub for their friends, but the addition of their daughter makes it feel like a children's play palace. Drew and Jonathan rework the space to create a home that's perfect for entertaining and raising a family.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: After living in small city condos, comic-enthusiasts Adam and Waylon found a spacious suburban home with good bones to settle into. The couple are anxious to get the renovations to turn this home into their dream home.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: A boisterous family of six needs to accommodate their son's accessibility needs and have enough space to host their large family holiday parties. Drew and Jonathan take the reins and transform the main living area, giving them the best Christmas yet.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: Alison and Greg have lived in their home for 22 years and raised their kids, who still live at home, in the house surrounded by a community that feels like home. The home's small kitchen and main floor layouts need some work.

programme.title: Celebrity I.O.U.
programme.desc: Melissa McCarthy heads to Chicago to give back to her aunt and uncle, both retired cops. Jonathan and Drew look back at creating an upstairs retreat where her aunt can entertain and a downstairs man cave equipped with all the comforts her uncle deserves.

programme.title: Celebrity I.O.U.
programme.desc: Actress Zooey Deschanel joins Jonathan and Drew Scott to surprise her best friend, Sarah, with a life-changing renovation. The family feels cramped after the arrival of their second baby, so Zooey and the Brothers give them a functional open concept.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: With pop-up facts and bonus footage, Tarek and Christina take on a house in a cookie-cutter neighborhood. When they arrive, they find torn-up drywall and missing exterior siding, making them wonder why someone would leave the property in such a hurry.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: With pop-up facts and bonus footage, Tarek and Christina take out an expensive, hard-money loan to flip a house in Fountain Valley, California. They're pressured to flip the house quickly as they juggle design decisions amidst a tight timeline.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: A contractor friend asks Tamara to work her magic on a 1948 ranch house. She installs a herringbone walkway and solves a dilemma while whitewashing the brick. Then, she adds a study space and upgrades a shared bathroom for kids.

programme.title: Celebrity I.O.U.
programme.desc: Viola Davis heads to Minneapolis to surprise her best friend of 30 years with a home renovation. Viola works with Jonathan and Drew Scott to create a peaceful sanctuary where this doting mom can finally put herself first.

programme.title: Stay or Sell
programme.desc: A couple wants to raise their family in the same suburb where they grew up, but it might be time for a move.

programme.title: Stay or Sell
programme.desc: Joe and Brittany's house would sell quickly and bring a great return on investment, but Brittany holds an elected seat in their district and would have to step down.

programme.title: Stay or Sell
programme.desc: A couple of newlyweds love their neighborhood and the design of their home, but think it's too small to start a family. Brad and Heather help them decide whether to stay or sell.

programme.title: Stay or Sell
programme.desc: Jay and Abby Brown love the location of their home, but need more space. Brad and Heather are determined to add some serious square footage.

programme.title: Stay or Sell
programme.desc: A couple needs more rooms in their house and space for their dog. They also want to be closer to the lake. They've decided to take their relationship to the next level and want to either invest in the house or find a new place.

programme.title: Stay or Sell
programme.desc: Lauren feels a strong connection to a home she designed, but Ben wants a bigger home. Brad and Heather bridge the divide between them by finding a solution they can agree on.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A couple from Alabama is excited to settle down in a small town for the next phase of their lives. Ben and Erin help them choose a forever home and give it a historic renovation complete with a gorgeous master suite, custom kitchen and screened-in porch.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: Ben and Erin Napier love their small town of Laurel, Mississippi. They're passionate about making their town flourish like it did years ago. The best way they know how is to make Laurel a friendly and welcoming place to live.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: Caroline and her husband, Corey, are moving home to follow her dream of opening a men's store. With a budget of $150,000, they're hoping to find a house that matches their authentic, early-century style and has an office worthy of their new business.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A woman who has been renting for years is ready to buy a home, and her wish list includes a master bathroom with a big bathtub. Ben and Erin capitalize on the charm of the house and design a Nantucket-inspired kitchen and a stunning master suite.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A family of four has outgrown their loft and is ready to use their all-in budget of $200,000 to move into an family home with a yard. Ben and Erin show the parents two family-friendly houses, including a dated, boxy home with 14 acres of property.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: An artist wants to raise her teenage son in the small town near their friends and family. With a budget of up to $200,000, her wish list includes plenty of room to welcome visitors and a dedicated art studio.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: A couple with a 19th-century home want it updated to fit their lifestyle. Dave and Jenny renovate the space while preserving its historic charm.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: Dave and Jenny modernize a couple's rundown log cabin while keeping its historic integrity intact. The top-to-bottom transformation includes new amenities like a custom live-edge bar, outdoor shower and a brand-new porch.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: Dave and Jenny reveal details behind the making of the episode and share fun facts as they tackle a couple's compartmentalized layout, unstable balconies and enormous, rotting tree. Dave adds more space in the kitchen while Jenny crafts a surprise.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: Two restaurant owners live in the house her grandfather built, but it's too old-fashioned for their taste and two active boys. When they call on Dave and Jenny to update their outdated ranch, the results are inspiring, modern and ready for entertaining.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: An engaged couple struggles to see eye to eye on their house hunt in Dallas. They're ready to leave their apartment and one wants a single-family home with outdoor space for their dogs and entertaining, but the other is set on a low-maintenance townhome.

programme.title: House Hunters International
programme.desc: A Georgia couple looks to give their kids an international experience and move for his work to Amsterdam. She's used to a larger home and wants five bedrooms on a canal, but he's watching their budget and wants something smaller with a short work commute.

programme.title: House Hunters

programme.title: Eddie Eats America

programme.title: Man v. Food

programme.title: Man v. Food

programme.title: Man v. Food

programme.desc: After a winter of record-setting warm temperatures, the Kilchers team up to tame the land. Otto and Eivin tackle turning raw wilderness into a source of food for generations to come. Atz Sr. battles the elements and a menace at the head of the bay.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: As the Kilcher family braces for summer on the homestead, Atz Lee treks to forbidding Perl Island for an emergency crash course in wilderness survival. Jane fights with creatures from the deep for food, and Otto and Eivin attempt a homestead sauna build.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: As spring draws to a close, Otto and August dig into a monumental plumbing project, and Eivin attempts to help but loses control of his truck. Atz Sr. searches for two predators threatening the Kilcher property. Atz Lee and Jane help Shane with his cabin.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: A never-before-seen lost episode travels back to before Atz Lee's near-fatal accident, as he planned a surprise ceremony to renew his vows with Jane at the head of the bay. Other Kilchers struggle while preparing for the big event.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: The Kilchers pay tribute to the family's patriarch and matriarch, Yule and Ruth, by preparing a feast using strictly old-fashioned methods.

programme.desc: Explorer Levison Wood sets out to walk the Nile River from source to sea, an epic 4,200 mile journey. Lev follows the river from the jungles of Rwanda, faces roadside robbers in Tanzania, and receives a blessing from a local witch doctor in Uganda.

programme.title: Walking the Nile
programme.desc: Lev continues through South Sudan, escaping the war torn mainland to visit the peaceful and enigmatic Mundari tribe. Arriving in Sudan, 2,000 miles into his journey, Lev faces his biggest obstacle yet: the Sahara Desert.

programme.title: Walking the Nile
programme.desc: Over 3000 miles and 7 months on foot, Lev enters his final country: Egypt. Passing through ancient cities, and discovering magnificent pyramids and ruins, Lev pushes through the pain of his last miles to make it to the finish line: the Mediterranean Sea.

programme.title: Walking With Elephants
programme.desc: Levison Wood is in Botswana to follow the world's largest elephant migration. Travelling on foot 650 miles along ancient elephant pathways, he must overcome dangers in the bush before tracking a large herd of female elephants.

programme.title: Walking With Elephants

programme.title: Walking With Elephants

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia is faced with the biggest rescue in Villalobos history when she gets a call about dogs that have been abandoned. When Tia, M2, Kanani, and Earl arrive on scene, it's one of the worst cases of neglect that Tia has ever seen.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: A former adopter comes back to Villalobos to find a companion to support her through her battle with cancer. The VRC crew join efforts to rescue an injured stray near the warehouse. And Tia puts a new parolee through his paces.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tania races to rescue a mama dog clinging to life after being in labour for two days. A young woman comes to Villalobos looking for a roommate to share her new home with.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia races to rescue an emaciated puppy chained to an abandoned home. A couple visits VRC in hope of finding a younger sibling for their dog. And a Good Samaritan needs help rescuing a stray mama dog still bleeding three weeks after giving birth.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: When a 3-legged dog has trouble finding a forever home, Amanda Giese from Panda Paws Rescue comes to New Orleans to help. Parolee Troy shares some life changing news with Tia and the VRC crew. And, Villalobos helps an employee's dad find a new companion.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tania is shocked by what she finds once she gets a stray dog back to the rescue. An empty nester brings her family to Villalobos to help her find a companion. And, the family are determined to solve their messy pigeon problem.

programme.title: North Woods Law

programme.desc: Sgt. Hawks and Officer Benvenuti supervise Trainee Frye's lobster trap detail. Officer Lucas and Trainee McDermott deal with a woman illegally keeping a wild squirrel. Officer Delisle and Biologist Marchand investigate the deaths of multiple turtles.

programme.desc: A romance writer has her column cancelled right before Christmas, so she heads home to reconnect with her family and sparks some romance of her own.

programme.title: The Christmas Cottage
programme.desc: An interior designer is made-of-honour at her friend’s wedding. Before the big day, she ends up stranded in the Christmas Cottage, where rumour has it, all guests will find everlasting love, with the brother of the bride.

programme.title: Double Holiday
programme.desc: A woman is tasked with throwing her companies holiday party, with her nemesis. The two must work together to mingle work and traditions to make the party a success.

programme.title: Enchanted Christmas
programme.desc: An interior designer returns to Utah to spearhead a hotel renovation for the annual Christmas Eve show run by her former boyfriend. When she steps in to dance in the show's finale with him, she is torn between her job, family and feelings.

programme.title: Holly and Ivy
programme.desc: After her neighbour's illness returns, a woman looks for someone to renovate her house so she can adopt her children.

programme.title: Unlocking Christmas
programme.desc: A mysterious key and riddle land on the doorsteps of two different people, they determine they must work together to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Meet Me at Christmas
programme.desc: A woman is forced to take the reins when her son's wedding planner quits on Christmas Eve. She receives some unexpected help from the bride's uncle, and realizes that fate has sent her a man from her past.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Second Chance, First Love
programme.desc: A man moves from Hawaii to his home town and ends up running into his high-school love.

programme.title: A Family Christmas Gift
programme.desc: A woman spends the holidays with her aunt to help plan a Christmas concert. While there, she finds herself drawing closer to her aunt, and, to the new love in her life.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Meant for Love
programme.desc: After many unbelievable coincidences, including being in the wrong place at the right time, two strangers discover they and their families were meant to be intertwined.

programme.title: Memories of Christmas
programme.desc: When Noelle inherits her late mother's home, she discovers Dave had been hired by her mother to decorate for the holidays each year. Dave convinces Noelle to continue the tradition as she begins to embrace her mother's holiday legacy.

programme.title: One Starry Christmas
programme.desc: Holly can't wait to go back to New York City and introduce her big shot boyfriend.

programme.title: Home for Christmas Day
programme.desc: A mother tries to protect her daughter from heartache after she develops a long-distance relationship with a soldier. They'll all soon learn lessons from the heart during a Christmas they'll cherish forever.

programme.title: Romance at Reindeer Lodge
programme.desc: A group of adults from different parts of the country swear off partaking in holiday events.

programme.title: A Merry Christmas Match
programme.desc: A woman lives in a ski village and works at the local antiques shop. One day, the local 'Christmas Catch Ryder' stops by her shop, and sparks fly between them.

programme.title: Christmas Under the Stars
programme.desc: A man loses his job right before Christmas, so he takes a temporary job selling trees. While at work, he meets a woman and her son, who are dealing with the sudden loss of her father. The two get to talking, and out of their loss, love grows.

programme.title: Small Town Christmas
programme.desc: A bestselling Christmas author reconnects with the man who inspired her novel and stood her up on a date in New York.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas
programme.desc: Two people find their paths continuing to cross over the holidays at Martha's Vineyard.

programme.title: Finding Christmas
programme.desc: A disgruntled New York ad executive swaps houses over Christmas with a disheartened North Carolina repairman, who is going through his own heartache.

programme.title: Angel Falls: A Novel Holiday
programme.desc: A book editor is tasked with working with her former rival to help a potential writer find her way.

programme.title: A Song for Christmas
programme.desc: Popstar Adelaide Kay sneaks off the tour bus and finds herself stranded in rural Pennsylvania. A family finds her and takes her in for Christmas.

programme.title: Time for Me to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: A cancelled flight lands two unlikely strangers together.

programme.title: Christmas in Angel Falls
programme.desc: Guardian Angel Gaby is sent to the town of Angel Falls to help restore it's Christmas Spirit. There she meets a volunteer fire chief that shows her the true meaning of love.

programme.title: Return to Christmas Creek
programme.desc: A young CEO travels back to the inn she grew up at, where she must convince her dad who she stopped talking to 20 years earlier to put aside their difference and experience the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: Holiday Engagement
programme.desc: A woman hires a man to pretend to be her fiancé over the holidays, but she soon realizes that she is in over her head and has to face the music.

programme.title: A Princess for Christmas
programme.desc: A young woman takes her niece and nephew to the English countryside to visit their grandfather, a royal duke, for Christmas. While there, she unwittingly falls for a dashing prince.

programme.title: The Christmas Ring
programme.desc: A reporter searches for the love story behind an antique engagement ring. With the help of the ring's owner's grandson, they learn the legacy his grandparent's left behind.

programme.title: A Christmas Love Story
programme.desc: A youth-choir director is tasked with writing the title song for her Christmas Eve show but becomes distracted when a gifted boy joins the choir. Unbeknownst to her, this boy does not tell his widowed father of his plans to sing in the service.

programme.title: A Glenbrooke Christmas
programme.desc: An heiress is looking for a low-key Christmas before her life takes over, so she heads to the small-town of Glenbrooke where she meets a handsome fireman.

programme.title: Karen Kingsbury's Maggie's Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: Single mom Maggie juggles her devotion to her son Jordan and having a career. When Jordan needs help at school, he meets and bonds with Casey, a tutor who becomes a father figure to him. With faith and fate, Maggie learns that anything is possible.

programme.title: Unlocking Christmas
programme.desc: A mysterious key and riddle land on the doorsteps of two different people, they determine they must work together to solve the mystery.

programme.desc: A woman spearheads her community efforts to save her street from demolition. While on her mission, she falls for a man and uncovers that he is actually working for the company she is fighting.

programme.title: A Joyous Christmas
programme.desc: A successful motivational speaker learns the true meaning of Christmas when she is rescued from a near fatal accident by a stranger.

programme.title: Moonlight and Mistletoe
programme.desc: A woman must return to her hometown of Santaville to help her father.

programme.title: The Magic Stocking
programme.desc: A young widow finds a tattered old Christmas stocking at a Holiday craft sale, but is sceptical of its magic when it seems to create small trinkets on its own.

programme.title: Catch a Christmas Star
programme.desc: When a pop star reunites with her first love, the pressures of the spotlight could threaten their budding romance.

programme.desc: A sister is in charge of selling their recently deceased parents' home, where she and an antiques expert find a hidden surprise that sends them on a journey to discover the power of love and family in the holidays.

programme.desc: A woman wakes up from a dream, holding a wedding dress, and assuming she is about to marry her fiancée. Only, that dream, ended two years before, and she has no idea who her current fiancée is.

programme.desc: In 1979, bar manager Harriet Simmons disappears during a trip to Nashville. In 1987, Jerri Ann Jones vanishes after she gets off work. It would take more than two decades for detectives to learn the identity of their common killer.

programme.title: Homicide City: Charlotte
programme.desc: Thirty-one year old Nikki McPhatter is a self-made success story Navy veteran and MBA graduate with a close circle of friends. She's only missing love. When she disappears, detectives follow a trail that leads them into the dark lair of a killer.

programme.title: Homicide City: Charlotte
programme.desc: When 18 year-old Harmahn Smith goes missing, his parents call on the CMPD to find him. Detectives run down every lead searching for the teenager, ultimately discovering the terrible details of what had begun for Harmahn as an uneventful night out.

programme.title: Lone Star Justice
programme.desc: As Detective Rasco digs deeper into the death of an army reserve sergeant, plenty of folk may have wanted to see his demise.

programme.title: Lone Star Justice
programme.desc: A woman asks Detective Joe Rasco to reopen the 1982 unsolved murder of her cousin Catheryn Powell. In doing so, he discovers a case filled with false leads, dead ends and fake confessions.

programme.title: Lone Star Justice
programme.desc: The bullet-riddled body of 19-year old college student Amanda Anderson is found by her younger brother, Nate. Detectives interview friends and neighbors, however, it's a microscopic discovery by the forensics team that leads to a shocking conclusion.

programme.title: American Nightmare
programme.desc: A storm rattles the night in Key Largo, Florida, as an intruder slips silently into the home of newlyweds Michael and Missy MacIvor. As daylight clears away the rain, a nightmare is revealed that will haunt the entire community for years to come.

programme.title: American Nightmare
programme.desc: When a charitable, up-and-coming actress is savagely murdered in her home, police believe an angry, revenge-hungry killer is responsible. No one could expect the lies, obsessions, and evidence that will be uncovered in this shocking cold case.

programme.title: American Nightmare
programme.desc: Winter in Iowa gets an extra chill when Shirley Wilson's son finds her stabbed to death in her home. With no forced entry, detectives believe this grandmother of 12 knew her assailant, leaving the family wondering who has betrayed them in cold blood.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: In Pennsylvania, Kevin and Joanne Dowling like to capture their kids' milestones on videotape in their modest suburban home. But when a woman in a nearby town is gunned down - and Kevin is accused of murder - his fate hangs on that same home video camera.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: Brent Cotta's popular wife, Cassie, has mysteriously disappeared on New Year's Eve in Fort Smith, Arkansas. When family and friends conduct a search, the discovery of a shallow grave soon leads to the horrific truth emerging.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: In Ogden, Utah, Stephen and Becky Vargas appear to have it all. Behind the picture perfect life seen in these rare home videos, jealousy and control issues are abound. But no one thought their marriage would end - in murder.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: When a man is struck down by a mysterious sickness, the entire town grieves but when his daughter also falls ill, the family becomes suspicious.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: When Albuquerque, New Mexico mail carrier Marilyn Gandert disappears for days, no one knows where she could have gone. When her burnt body is found in the desert, detectives must find their murderer with few witnesses beyond Marilyn's family members.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: Ty Underwood, a transgender woman, is found shot to death in her car, leaving detectives to wonder if she may have been a victim of a hate crime. Detectives use text messages, social media posts, and surveillance footage to track down her killer.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: When 27-year-old Byron Edwards is found brutally stabbed in his home, his family is absolutely devastated. But as detectives work to find the person responsible, they discover a single piece of evidence that changes the course of their investigation.

programme.title: The Nanny Trial: The Crimes That Changed Us
programme.desc: Louise Woodward, an 18-year-old au pair from Britain, is accused of murdering eight-month-old Matthew Eappen by violently shaking him. Her trial creates a media firestorm, searing the term 'shaken baby syndrome' into America's consciousness.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: A mother and three teens are murdered in the remote town of Keddie, California. Despite a trail of suspects and illicit activity, no one was ever brought to justice. But recently discovered evidence may be the key to finally cracking case.

programme.desc: The NCIS team investigates the crash of an armoured transport bus carrying Naval brig detainees after four prisoners escape, including a black market broker who is one of the country's biggest security threats. Meanwhile, Pride turns to Gibbs for help.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After a Navy SEAL is found murdered in a sorority house, the team must determine if the motive pertained to one of his classified missions or collegiate foul play. Meanwhile, Pride's daughter, Laurel, pays the NCIS office a visit.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans

programme.desc: Billie jeopardizes the Charmed Ones' new lives when she uses her powers to save an innocent and is caught by Homeland Security. Meanwhile, Piper and Paige organize a speed dating night at P3 to get the club back on its financial feet.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: While attempting to vanquish a demon, Billie is flooded with childhood flashbacks about her sister and she casts a spell to erase her fears. Paige turns to the Elders for help when she and her sisters are bombarded by the press.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive

programme.desc: At just 24, Bettie Jo is eating her way towards 700 pounds. Housebound, she is reliant on her husband for even basic needs. Bettie Jo's future relies on her losing weight and her husband losing his fear that if she loses weight she will leave him.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
